name: Amity
0:
”Alexa, ask Amity if there are any Lodges near Fort Worth”
”Alexa, launch Amity”
”Alexa, open Amity”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amity
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Amity is a groundbreaking mobile application that helps Freemasons find each other, anywhere in the world. Amity's skill for Alexa helps you find Lodges, find meeting times, check recognition, and vet your visitors... all with just your voice! 

To find a local Lodge, say: Alexa, ask Amity if there are any Lodges near Auckland, New Zealand.

To find meeting times, say: Alexa, ask Amity if there are any meetings in Glasgow, Scotland next Tuesday.

To check whether you can visit another Lodge, say: Alexa, ask Amity if I can visit Fort Worth Lodge No. 148 in Texas.

To check whether your visitor's Lodge is recognized, say: Alexa, ask Amity if a Brother from Potomac Lodge Number 5 in Washington, DC can visit my Lodge.

Thanks for experiencing the Craft in a more personal fashion with us. Amity is bringing modern technology to the world's oldest fraternity... welcome to the future.
